subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Without Carmelo Anthony, out with back spasms, the Knicks fell to the Mavericks, who got a big game from the ex-Knick Tyson Chandler.
snippet: Without Carmelo Anthony, out with back spasms, the Knicks fell to the Mavericks, who got a big game from the ex-Knick Tyson Chandler.
